Goal.name: Goal
Goal.description: The Goal object represents the components of a goal such as its name, description, and status.

CompletionDate.description: The completion date of the goal.

Description.description: The description of the goal. The maximum length is 65,535 characters.

DueDate.description: The date the goal is due.

ImageUrl.description: The URL for the goal image. The image must be stored in Documents and set as externally available. Applicable only to Goal objects of Type: Goal.

IsKeyCompanyGoal.description: Indicates whether the goal is a key company goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp that indicates when a user last viewed a record that is related to this goal.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp that indicates when a user last viewed this goal. If this value is null, this record might have been only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the goal. The maximum length is 255 characters.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns the goal.

Progress.description: The progress of the goal measured as a percentage.

StartDate.description: The start date of the goal.

Status.description: The status of the goal.Possible values: Draft Published Completed Canceled Not Completed
